item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: 75 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup cream cheese, softened
  • 1/2 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/4 cup milk
  • 3 large eggs, separated
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 tablespoon lemon juice
  • 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 320Â°F (160Â°C) and prepare a round cake pan by lining it with parchment paper.
  2. In a mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth, then add sugar, milk, and mix until combined.
  3. Add the egg yolks, vanilla extract, lemon juice, flour, and salt, mixing until smooth.
  4. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form, then gently fold them into the cream cheese mixture.
  5. Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake in a water bath for about 60 minutes, or until set and golden.
  6. Let the cheesecake cool completely before removing from the pan and serving.
